original_title: Big Band: Tex Beneke, Gene Krupa & Jerry Wald
overview: It's jazz at its finest when former leader of the Glenn Miller Orchestra Tex Beneke, superstar drummer Gene Krupa and clarinetist Jerry Wald join forces for the legendary performance captured here. Beneke demonstrates his amiable singing style and saxophone chops, while the rest of the gang swing through a variety of tunes popularized by their own bands as well as others.
title: Big Band: Tex Beneke, Gene Krupa & Jerry Wald
